g.title: formula
g.text: Effective Range = Base Range x (Target Size / Resolution)^2

g.title: scaling_graph
g.text: Effective Range % vs Target Size (for Resolution-160 FC = 8,000 ton)

g.title: example
g.text: Capital FCs cannot engage small craft!

g.title: implications
g.text: Anti-ship MFC: Resolution 50-500 (long range vs capitals)
Anti-FAC MFC: Resolution 5-20 (medium range vs small craft)
Anti-missile MFC: Resolution 1 (short range vs missiles)
